text:
A fashion show by students mentored by popular fashion designer Rocky S is set to depict different cultures of the country here.

The show, put up by students of JD Institute of Fashion Technology, will be held at NCUI Auditorium here on Wednesday. “India is a land of colours and diverse cultures. For this fashion show, my focus is to show different elements of India’s diverse cultures and at the same time make sure that it is evident in the varied dresses as well,” Rocky S said.

The theme for the 26th JD Annual Design Awards will be announced during the event. — IANS
title: Delhi fashion show to depict Indian culture
